rounds.response:
7♣ 2♠ is the weakest starting hand in hold’em (72-offsuit). We’re in the small blind, so it will cost us another 10 chips just to see if the opponent is willing to give away free flops by checking their big blind.

With ten rounds ahead we should not commit any chips outside strong holdings or steal spots. Folding here saves 10 chips that can be used more profitably later.  
[Fold]
